sentence.text: In the present study, we sought to identify the factors involved in the RAR&alpha;-mediated transcriptional regulation of the tumor suppressor gene and the tissue factor pathway inhibitor 2 (blood coagulation) in hepatocellular carcinoma (phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation).

The musculo-aponeurotic fibrosarcoma oncogene homolog B (MAFB) significantly enhanced the activation of the blood coagulation promoter via RAR&alpha; while positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II inhibited it.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: These results suggest that MAFB and positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II play critical roles in the antitumor effects of retinoids by regulating the expression of retinoid target genes such as TFPI2 and can be promising for developing therapies to combat HCC invasion

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
